notes:
Doesn't work out of the box, possible to get working mostly fine with workarounds (you need to run the game from a terminal rather than the Steam client). Campaign/quick battle work well. Multiplayer untested.
Steps taken to get working:
Create 32-bit WINE prefix to install icodecs to (and to ensure sound works correctly):
$> WINEPREFIX="$HOME/wine32" WINEARCH=win32 wine wineboot

With 32-bit prefix set as default prefix, install icodecs:
$> winetricks icodecs

The intro movies do not work on Linux, run the game from terminal using wine (rather than Steam client) like so:
$> wine Conquest.exe /skipmovies

Uncheck "Enable DirectInput" option in game to fix slow mouse issue and game is now fully playable for me with full sound and graphics.
title: Conquest: Frontier Wars
